c:complexType.name: HeatGridChart
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Heat grid chart.

c:property.name: seriesRole
c:property.c:documentation:
The series visual role of the heat grid chart organizes visual elements along the discrete orthogonal axis.
For additional information, see the base version of this property: .

c:property.name: categoryRole
c:property.c:documentation:
The category visual role of the heat grid chart organizes visual elements along the discrete base axis, and is restricted to be discrete.
For additional information, see the base version of this property: .

c:property.name: colorRole
c:property.c:documentation:
The color visual role controls the color of the visual elements.
The color visual role automatically binds to a single numeric dimension, whose name is value.
The color visual role is optional and numeric.
When unbound, the visual elements all show the same color.
See for more information on supported data types.

c:property.name: sizeRole
c:property.c:documentation:
The size visual role controls the size of the dot visual elements, when in "shapes" mode".
The size visual role automatically binds to a single numeric dimension whose name is value2.
The size visual role is optional and numeric.
When unbound, all the dot visual elements are sized to the grid cell size.
See for more information on supported data types.

c:property.name: colorAxis
c:property.c:documentation:
The first color axis options.
This axis can also be accessed by the property name color.
See for more information on the way that the color axes' properties may be accessed.

c:property.name: baseAxis
c:property.c:documentation:
The base cartesian axis panel options.
When the chart is vertical the base axis is laid out horizontally.
See to know the additional names by which a cartesian axis can be referred to.

c:property.name: orthoAxis
c:property.c:documentation:
The orthogonal cartesian axis panel options.
When the chart is vertical the orthogonal axis is laid out vertically.
See to know the additional names by which a cartesian axis can be referred to.

c:property.name: useCompositeAxis
c:property.c:documentation: Use instead. Indicates if the cartesian axes are shown in a composite/hierarchical form.

c:property.name: heatGrid
c:property.c:documentation: The heat grid plot is the main plot of the heat grid chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "heatGrid" property suffix.

c:complexType.name: HeatGridPlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Heat grid plot.

c:property.name: useShapes
c:property.c:documentation:
Indicates if the heat-grid uses as visual elements dot-shapes, within each grid cell.
When false the visual elements are the grid cells themselves.
When shapes are used the
visual role can be used.

c:property.name: shape
c:property.c:documentation:
The shape to use in the dot mark (applies when using shapes).
See .

c:property.name: nullShape
c:property.c:documentation:
The shape to use when the value of the size role is null.
See .

c:property.name: valuesVisible
c:property.c:documentation:
Indicates if value labels are shown next to the visual elements.
The heat-grid shows as values the color role value, if bound, or, otherwise, the size role value, if bound.

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points object contains style definitions for the marks of the plot.

c:complexType.name: HeatGridPlotExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The extension points of the Heat grid plot types.
To use an extension point you must find its full name, by joining:
plot property name (ex: heatGrid)
extension property (ex: panel)
the "_" character
extension sub-property (ex: strokeStyle)
and obtaining, for the examples, the camel-cased name: heatGridPanel_strokeStyle (see ).
The extension points of the main plot of a chart may be used without the plot property name prefix. In the example, when the heatGrid plot is the main plot, the extension point can be written as panel_strokeStyle.

c:property.name: panel
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the "cell" panel of the heat grid plot.

c:property.name: label
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the value label mark.

c:property.name: dot
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the dot mark, existent in the "shapes" mode.
